description:
We don't have any functional testing for this API extension:

http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/tree/nova/api/openstack/compute/contrib/volumes.py?id=2015.1.0b3#n588

There are unit tests:

http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/tree/nova/tests/unit/api/openstack/compute/contrib/test_volumes.py?id=2015.1.0b3#n125

But no functional tests, which is kind of bad especially given we don't have any test coverage in Tempest since the test_volume_boot_pattern scenario test is skipped due to bug 1373513.
title: There is no API samples functional testing for the os-volumes_boot API

comments.content:
We don't have any functional testing for this API extension:

http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/tree/nova/api/openstack/compute/contrib/volumes.py?id=2015.1.0b3#n588

There are unit tests:

http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/tree/nova/tests/unit/api/openstack/compute/contrib/test_volumes.py?id=2015.1.0b3#n125

But no functional tests, which is kind of bad especially given we don't have any test coverage in Tempest since the test_volume_boot_pattern scenario test is skipped due to bug 1373513.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: Removing assignee due to lack of visible progress for a period of over one month. Pushkar, please reassign yourself if I am wrong.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mszankin

comments.content:
@Matt, the '/os-volume_boot' is just clone of '/servers', I think we will deprecate that path.

Or you expected some api sample test for BDM?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~xuhj
